titleStmt.title: A paraphrase on the canticles, or, Song of Solomon by the late learned and pious Protestant, Thomas Ager.
titleStmt.author: Ager, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Godbid and J. Playford and are to be sold by Samuel Sprint ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Pages 371-390 have print show-through in filmed copy. Pages 350-end of book photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at end.
